original_text: Zibeon's sons were Aiah and Anah. This was the same Anah who found a place with hot water in the wilderness when he was taking care of his father Zibeon's donkeys.
korean_text: 시브온의 자녀는 아야와 아나며 이 아나는 그 아버지 시브온의 나귀를 칠 때에 광야에서 온천을 발견하였고

sentences.original_text: Zibeon's sons were Aiah and Anah
who found a place with hot water
sentences.korean_translation: 뜨거운 물이 있는 곳을 발견한 사람

sentences.original_text: when he was taking care of his father Zibeon's donkeys
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아버지 시본의 나귀들을 돌볼 때
